            target: Variable(

                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        name: "a",
                    },
                ),
            ),

                1,

            ),

                SimpleIdentifier(

                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            12,
                        ),
                        value: "b",
                    },
                ),
            ),
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                13,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
